metadata.title: CVE-2019-8375 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The UIProcess subsystem in WebKit, as used in WebKitGTK through 2.23.90 andWebKitGTK+ through 2.22.6 and other products, does not prevent the scriptdialog size from exceeding the web view size, which allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (Buffer Overflow) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact, related to UIProcess/API/gtk/WebKitScriptDialogGtk.cpp,UIProcess/API/gtk/WebKitScriptDialogImpl.cpp, andUIProcess/API/gtk/WebKitWebViewGtk.cpp, as demonstrated by GNOME Web (akaEpiphany).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8375` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.24.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.24.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.24.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.24.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.24.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.24.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.24.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
webkit2gtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.24.1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
